message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth $10,000 to you at a slightly discounted price. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the discount, $9,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value to me and your own asking price. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to come up with a mutually beneficial solution. I am willing to consider your offer at $8,750 for the product. This is the highest price I can go for now, given its value to you and my own asking price. I hope this proposal works for you. Let me know your thoughts.
